McCaskill Statement on Report of Attempted Russian Hacking

Attempted hack of Senator’s official office was unsuccessful

WASHINGTON – U.S.

Senator Claire McCaskill released the following statement in response to the report that Russian hackers attempted to target her Senate computer network:

“Russia continues to engage in cyber warfare against our democracy.
I will continue to speak out and press to hold them accountable.
While this attack was not successful, it is outrageous that they think they can get away with this.

I’ve said it before and I will say it again, Putin is a thug and a bully.”

###
